name: elch-js
description: A tiny templating engine written in typescript

scripts.build: mkdir dist & npm run lint && browserify src/main.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --target es6 ] --standalone Elch  > dist/elch.js && npm run polish
scripts.watch: mkdir dist & watchify src/main.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --target es6 ] --standalone Elch -o dist/elch.js -v

author: Paul
